name: Matador Whitsundays 2D/1N
description: Experience the thrill of sailing aboard Matador, a legendary racing yacht, as you explore the stunning Whitsunday Islands. This adventure offers a perfect mix of relaxation and hands-on sailing, making it ideal for thrill-seekers and nature lovers alike. Glide through turquoise waters, relax on the spacious deck, and enjoy freshly prepared meals with local produce. Discover the breathtaking beauty of Whitehaven Beach and the vibrant marine life of the Great Barrier Reef. Perfect for those seeking a unique sailing experience with a blend of adventure and relaxation.
departure_times: Departs Monday, Wednesday & Saturday, Returns in the afternoon
includes:
Sailing aboard a legendary racing yacht
Freshly prepared meals with local produce
Snorkeling equipment
Guided snorkeling sessions
Visit to Whitehaven Beach
Stargazing experience
highlights:
Sail through the Whitsunday Islands
Experience the thrill of a legendary racing yacht
Relax on the spacious deck
Snorkel among vibrant coral gardens
Visit the iconic Whitehaven Beach
Enjoy freshly prepared meals with local produce
Witness stunning sunsets and stargaze

ideal_for: Thrill-seekers, nature lovers, and those seeking a unique sailing adventure
